alert.note: Alert for Humboldt County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 18 at 1:13AM PST until December 18 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Light freezing rain. Accumulations of 0.01" or less. * WHERE...Humboldt County. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute as ice can create slick spots on roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Pockets of light freezing rain are possible in portions of Humboldt County during the morning hours. Precipitation type changes over to light rain by midday today as surface temperatures warm above freezing.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
